name: Mr Juggler
description:
Are you fast enough to pass all the levels and unlock Turbo Circus Mode?
Get all characters - vikings, knights, car mechanics and princesses! Enjoy juggling various objects and improve your reflex!
Mr Juggler told us passing EXTREME mode is almost impossible - maybe you’ll be lucky and smart enough to do that?

Features:
- 20 normal levels
- 20 extreme levels
- endless Turbo Circus Mode
- 25+ unique charcters to unlock
- global leaderboards & achievements
- lovely iOS Stickers
- free gifts & various trophies to get
- fully localized to English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Russian and Polish
developers: DIGITAL MELODY GAMES KITAJEWSKI I STALEWSKI SPOLKA JAWNA
publishers: DIGITAL MELODY GAMES KITAJEWSKI I STALEWSKI SPOLKA JAWNA
